definitions.text: carry out or participate in an activity; be involved in
consume all of one's attention or time
examples: Her interest in butterflies absorbs her completely
They hired two new secretaries in the department
How many people has she employed?

definitions.text: ask to represent; of legal counsel

examples: make sure the gear is engaged
Napoleon and Hitler waged war against all of Europe
engage aid, help, services, or support

definitions.text: engage for service under a term of contract
examples: We took an apartment on a quiet street
Shall we take a guide in Rome?
